attributes.action: issue the police and other agencies more powers to disperse gangs and to be able to deal with them more effectively.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We demand that our streets and homes are safe from the gangs that are now over running them.

We do not  want more cases such as Fiona Pilkington, this poor lady was let down at every turn.  It is time for our Country to get tough, today they are gangs of kids, tomorrow they are organised crime gang members.
